name: Flowing Flame
title: Diluc: Flowing Flame
desc: A simple way out of perilous situations.

source: Reward for inviting Diluc to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1301], equip this card.
After $[A1301] equips this card, immediately use $[S13012] once.
When your $[A1301], who has this card equipped, uses $[S13012] for the second time in one Round, spend 1 less Pyro Die.
(You must have $[A1301] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
